comments:

menu item.  I am unable to do this due to the following exception:

The exception that was logged is only a symptom of the real problem. I haven't 
been able to reproduce the exact failure but there were a few places where 
errors where accumulated but never logged. I have released code that will log 
these problems which will hopefully reveal the real cause of the problem. 
Could you load the releng plugin from HEAD and try the tag again. Hopefully 
more useful information on the failure will be logged.

The version from HEAD works for me.  So far, nothing has been written to 
the .log.

I'll mark this as fixed then. Future failures should result in an appropriate 
log entry that can be included in a new bug
